meanings.definition: In a noisy and chaotic manner.
meanings.sent1: The children ran clatteringly through the playground.
meanings.sent2: The dishes fell clatteringly to the floor in the busy kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The clatteringly traffic made it impossible to hear the music playing.
